abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the OECS (Organization
            of Eastern Caribbean States) Skills for Inclusive Growth
            Project (Adaptable Program Lending) is to assist the
            Government of St. Lucia to increase the employability of
            youth through private-sector driven training. The
            restructuring includes: (a) changes to the scope of
            activities; (b) revisions to project financing; (c) an
            update of the results framework; and (d) an extension of the
            closing date. In summary, the changes entail the following:
            i) a reduction in the number of trainees to be better
            aligned to market absorption capacity; ii) an elimination of
            the monetary contribution of employers to the training
            scheme in order to offset the economic downturn and
            encourage their participation; and iii) a shift in resources
            from training to building and sustaining the policy
            framework for competency-based training and quality assurance.
